Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor

The function AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor sets the provider's global 3D doppler factor.

void AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor(
  HPROVIDER provider,
  F32 factor
);

In Parameters

provider
indicates the provider to set.
factor
indicates new doppler factor to use.

Discussion

The doppler factor controls the scale of the doppler effects. The default doppler scale is 1.0 which means no change to the calculated "real-world" doppler. You can double the doppler effect by using 2.0, and you can turn off doppler completely by using 0.0.

Use the AIL_set_3D_velocity function to set the velocity of your samples and the listener.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_doppler_factor, AIL_set_3D_velocity
Related Basic Types: F32, HPROVIDER, void
